website_summaries.verdict: An excellent all-around road tire that holds a high p.s.i. without trouble and resists punctures.
pros: Attractive styling gives tire a sleek look
Added graphene helps tire resist punctures
Stays grippy in the corners and light on the straightaways, making for easy acceleration
cons: Tires are slightly smaller than advertised measurements, and can therefore be difficult to mount correctly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these tires
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these tires!! I replaced my trusty Continental 4000 Grand Prix with these since I couldn't find them in red. I have to admit I was not happy to have to switch because I loved those tires but I am pleasantly surprised by these wheels so far! About 200 miles in - nice smooth ride!!! Hopefully when it comes time for new tires again, I can find these as I will most definitely buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: puncture-resistant, nice ride
customer_reviews.text: Online cost much lower than the bicycle shop mark-up, and I installed the tires myself without much difficulty. The ride was very nice. And I like the puncture resistance which reduces my worries of a flat, though I do have a spare inner tube in case of emergency. After several hundred miles as of 8-28-18, everything is fine. I weigh around 150 lbs, the bike around 19 lbs, grand total maybe 180 lbs if include clothing, gear, and hydration. All riding is on roads, mostly asphalt, occasional concrete. I will try to remember to update this post with tire lifetime mileage.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Just OK for me
customer_reviews.text: The tires have been ok so far. Have yet to have a puncture flat so that is good. Thye also roll pretty nice. They don't stand quite as high as the Gatorskins that I was used to riding on and are very tight fitting. I pinched a tube the first time and cut the tube. the second time I was able to get it on without issue. Need to be very careful with these. Not sure If I would do these again. Will probably go back to the Gatorskins.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the vittoria tires
customer_reviews.text: I really like the vittoria tires. quality w/o breaking the bank. I had 1200mi on my vittoria pro slicks. I have about 1300 on my rubino pro g+. They still have some time left but I am going to change them out to keep good rubber. I have had only one flat during my last 1300mi. The red stripe also just looks really cool. I ride a 2016 kestrel talon 105. It looks mean.
customer_reviews.author: chris sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, great grip and highly durable. Much better than Continental Grand Prix  4000s
customer_reviews.text: Great looking tires with good grip on road and good braking power. Makes my bike look so much better. I also tried the continental grand prix 4000s but this is one is so much better. The conti sidewalls are tearing after 2 months and wears out really easy and it costs twice as much as Vittoria.This one is durable and no issues after multiple installations. Seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Best All-Around tire made today.
customer_reviews.text: For all intents and purposes these are amazing tires for both training in racing. Very supple ride, superb durability (last about 4K so I only run through two pairs a year) and awesome grip both in the dry and in the wet. The Vittoria Corsa's cover my race wheels but truthfully this rubber that is on my training wheels would not hold me back in a race.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Seem like a competent example for the money
customer_reviews.text: I was waffling between these and the Continentals that are in the same price range. Next time I buy tires I'll probably be waffling again. I now have a few hundred miles on these and they seem to be doing ok for me. I wouldn't gush over them, but they seem like a good choice. The blue stripe matches my bike, so that's a nice, although unimportant side benefit. I avoid riding in the wet, but I got wetter today than I'd like, and the tires seemed to provide reasonable traction.
customer_reviews.author: SAChapmanTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Fast. Supple, sticky. Good ride and corner well. On the downside were kinda hard to seat reliably although for the sake of full disclosure I'm using 30 year old rims with 'em. Once seated though they have been great. I do not expect them to last much beyond 1000 miles though so if I were looking for a long lasting tire these would not be the ones. These tires are as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: BBarott

customer_reviews.title: Only 83 miles and Slit Tire
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this tire, since I had used the Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Slick and got 2200 miles out of them with only 1 flat tire. I thought this would be an upgrade. Sadly, I only got 83 miles out of this tire when I experienced a flat. I got a 1/4" slit in the tire. I'm not to sure I'll give this tire another chance. I'm trying the Continential GP 4000s II, and will post a review after (hopefully) several hundred miles. I may patch the inside and keep it as a spare.
customer_reviews.author: EG125

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have previously owned Rubino pro tires and loved them. These g+ tires roll decent and are not too stiff but the biggest negative is that they are smaller than advertised: my 25c measures 23.5-24. They are also very difficult to mount. My old Rubino pros mounted very easily by hand. These new g+ gave me great difficulty even while using a bead jack. I hope they never flat or I hope the bead loosens up a bit over time.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Low Mileage
customer_reviews.text: 2700 Miles on this tire. It was the rear tire. Overall a good product I inherited on my colnago C60. Similar mileage on the pro control(3000 miles). I do only country road riding with very little elevation gain. When these tires go they really go......rubber hanging off. No flats to speak of other than 1 HUGH pothole I didn't see that no tire could withstand.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great, inexpensive bike upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these (700 X 28c) as an upgrade to those that came stock (32c) on my Bianchi Camaleonte One (2012). It's like night and day; the ride is plusher yet more precise, I accelerate faster and find that I'm often riding one gear higher than previously. I weigh 70 kg and ride on the road at 88 psi front / 93 psi rear. Oh yeah, and they look great too.
customer_reviews.author: MNF

customer_reviews.title: Supple and fast
customer_reviews.text: Great tires and made a big difference moving from basic slicks that were hard as a rock but I didn’t know it until I got these. They made my ride a little more plush but still firm and fast. They have great grip and low rolling resistance and are wearing pretty well so all-around great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Graphene made a difference
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and fast with no cuts and nicks compared to non G+ versions. Easy to get on the wheel as well compared to other brands. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Ari L.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire so far
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires so far. I have a little over 2,000 Miles on them and just now starting to show signs of wear. I’ve had one flat with them so I feel it’s a good combination of light and protection. I will most likely get another set unless something goes wrong
customer_reviews.author: VolFan

customer_reviews.title: good for about 3000 miles on a road bike
customer_reviews.text: Loses its' toughness after about 3000. I wonder if the gator tires by continental will last longer. That's my next purchase. Anyway after about 2500 I would change this tire out.
customer_reviews.author: augustus

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tires! They are fast and smooth, and seem to be wearing very well. Transaction was very good and product arrived when expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Can't even get them over my rims.  Stupid tight.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure there would be great tires if they didn't require the fitter to bethel Incredible. I've replaced lots of tires over the years and these are the very first I couldn't get on my rims. They're insanely tight and even if I give in and go to a LBS to fit them, I have no confidence I'd be able to get these back on if I flat out somewhere. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Slightly better than my Vittoria stock tires
customer_reviews.text: These tires are wearing out so quickly it is astonishing. Will definitely be paying the little extra for Continental next time. That being said, the tires are fine I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: Great tires. they're comfortable, rugged and reasonably fast. A pair lasts me about a year at about 3500-5000 miles per year. flats are few and far between and the red walls look really nice on the bike. I'll buy another pair next year!
customer_reviews.author: david e

customer_reviews.title: These tires are better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These tires are better than I expected. Performed excellent on a cross country race in the desert with ridiculous road temps and terrible pavement. Can’t imagine a better product test.
customer_reviews.author: Dempsy C.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the ride
customer_reviews.text: These look great and have great traction. They were easy to install. I used new tubes when I installed them. They are very lightweight and the ride is smooth. I stuck with Vittoria tires but upgraded to the Rubino Pro G.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Roberts

customer_reviews.title: great every day road tire
customer_reviews.text: I loved the triathlon tire, but sadly they no longer make it. I switched to these in 25c and have been very pleased the first month I've had them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t stay on my rims when inflated.
customer_reviews.text: This wouldn’t stay on my rims and blew off twice, making my ears ring and spraying sealant everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Loytron

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for a decent price. At 80$ a set I was wondering how they would hold up. Cornering is a dream and I love the grip. Puncture resistance is on par with gatorskin the
customer_reviews.author: TriKen

customer_reviews.title: Nice tire with speed.  Only used it about 50 miles, will need to update for wear after a few thousand miles.
customer_reviews.text: I can pump it up to 120psi, which increase my speed easily by 0.7 mph. Not too hard to install.
customer_reviews.author: N. OY.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happily on my second set of these tires!
customer_reviews.author: D. Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY resistant!!! BEST choice ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced it couple weeks ago, am still so impressed ever time I reide, and I ride to work and back everyday, I couldn't be happier. I was deciding between Vittoria and Gatorskin, and i am so glad I chose Vittoria!
customer_reviews.author: flamevill

customer_reviews.title: Road tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire, these are the only brand and model I run on all my road bikes.
customer_reviews.author: bobby bran

customer_reviews.title: Good on dry and wet roads
customer_reviews.text: Road from London to Rome, 2056 miles without a puncture. Good on dry and wet roads.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buscher

customer_reviews.title: A good all around road tire.
customer_reviews.text: A foldable tire that is still easy to install. Even though this tire has steel beads, the tire could still. E mounted to the wheel with out superhuman strength nor broken tire irons.
customer_reviews.author: moreynj

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: Happy with these tires so far (about 300 miles). They are light (for the price), look good (red matches my bike well), and have noticably better grip than the smooth tires I had before. One complaint, they were very hard to get on.
customer_reviews.author: SethWH34

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 350 miles in and so far so good. No flats, decent grip and rolls fast.
customer_reviews.author: JoshSonOfBob

customer_reviews.title: Classy Tires
customer_reviews.text: Durable, tread doesn't collect sand or small rocks. Tires performed well in the rain. No problem on my recent 100+ mile ride with 2 days of rain. White walls compliment my pink and white bike perfectly, a touch of class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to tire
customer_reviews.text: We switched over to Rubino Pros after consistent problems with casing integrity on another high-profile brand's flagship tire. They ride well and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Halcyon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tires!
customer_reviews.text: So far (less 100 miles) I love this tire. Grippy and feels fast, easy to put on (folder). Time will tell how well it holds up, but I think it'll do fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Slow Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: The tire is great!!!! But the shipping is so slow!
customer_reviews.author: Ariadnna

customer_reviews.title: After swearing by Rubino pro IIIs, I tried these ...
customer_reviews.text: After swearing by Rubino pro IIIs, I tried these new ones and have ended up many flats and cuts on the tires. I can't say I'm a fan of this new compound. Hope I can still find some pro IIIs.
customer_reviews.author: Britt S.

customer_reviews.title: I love these tires.
customer_reviews.text: I love these tires great grip smooth ride.They look great for a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck 700c tire
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for an even better price!! Very easy to mount on rim so definitely a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good and last long
customer_reviews.text: Not the first time I’m using Vitoria tires. They last long and I like the ride on them. Also, very good price for a good tire.
customer_reviews.author: Guy M.

customer_reviews.title: My go to road tire
customer_reviews.text: These have become my go to road tire. Great all around tire. I have tried a lot of tires and these are my favs. Like them better than The Continentals and can usually find them for significantly less $.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great tires!
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires! These replaced a pair of the same kind which lasted for EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Blacklab

customer_reviews.title: Mounted easily and seems to be holding up fine
customer_reviews.text: Mounted easily and seems to be holding up fine. I ride only about 50 miles a week, but these tires are great for my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these tires!
customer_reviews.text: I ride over 35 miles a day and these tires grip well!
customer_reviews.author: Chaps

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tires
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Vitoria Rubino Pro Tires. I have not put a lot of miles on the G+ yet but so far they are performing well.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These tires look great and have held up great. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Feel great on the road
customer_reviews.text: A bit more than 500 miles in. No flats yet. Feel great on the road. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: John Grotjohn

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Great tires at an affordable price! I've always been happy with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schmotter

customer_reviews.title: I have Vittoria Rubino on my 3 bicycles Love them great
customer_reviews.text: I have Vittoria Rubino on my 3 bicycles Love them great tires
customer_reviews.author: Jose M Colon

customer_reviews.title: Buy these tires!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tire! Mounts easy and rolls fast with good grip. Completed a Century ride on these today without a problem. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: William Robinson

customer_reviews.title: but I love how the Vittoria Rubino Pro G+ tires ride
customer_reviews.text: I have only done 2 workouts so far, but I love how the Vittoria Rubino Pro G+ tires ride. They are noticeably better than the Continental Gatorskin tires I was riding before.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Even matches my cables! No defects. Will buy again when ready.
customer_reviews.author: CGB

customer_reviews.title: BLOWOUT around 300 miles
customer_reviews.text: I had a sidewall blowout after ~300 miles. It wore unevenly after light riding.
customer_reviews.author: Mik Spec

customer_reviews.title: Roll great.
customer_reviews.text: Roll better than Gatorskins. Get the 28mm,the width helps also.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Painton

customer_reviews.title: Fast Smooth Ride
customer_reviews.text: Tires are fast and grip well. No flats yet with about 500 miles on them. Was really looking forward to the 25mm width, but they measure to 23.5 same as my old tires. Over all they give a good smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've got serious thorns where I live. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I've got serious thorns where I live. I was having a flat a week, tubes were mostly patches it seemed. Bought these tires, and haven't had a single flat in the 10 weeks since. Are the carbon nanotubes a gimmick? I can't say... but I haven't had any flats at all. Haven't noticed much difference otherwise between these and my previous Bontrager tires, the standard ones that came with my Madone.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Nice value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fit onto rims and very nice road grip.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Milne

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: my bike mechanic said it was one helluva well made tire!
customer_reviews.author: ikepono

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Great tires, will purchase again, if I ever have too... That's how good they are!
customer_reviews.author: Jorgekdkd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the price, light and rolls very well, 25 and 28c.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty to look at, not sure if the extra layer works.
customer_reviews.text: I like how this tire looks, and the idea behind it- but the second week it was professionally put on my wheel, I got a flat tire. I looked and saw that a thorn had pierced through, directly in the middle of the tire. I patched the inner tube and haven't had another incident, but it kinda sucked that the science behind it didn't really hold up when on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around Tire for Casual Riders
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of Rubino Pro tires I've purchased. I love them. I am a casual rider (about 40-80 mi/wk during the riding season and ~1500 mi/yr). Mostly ride concrete paved bike paths and relatively well paved asphalt mountain roads. These tires hold up well and provide great grip in corners without too much rolling resistance. We have a lot of goat heads on the Colorado plains and these tires are not going to stop those pricks (pun intended). happy riding.
customer_reviews.author: cindersisty

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires
customer_reviews.text: Switched to these after using gatorskins. These offer a much softer and more forgiving ride than the gators. Have put about 200 miles on them so far and couldn't be happier. I have only had them on wet roads once and had no problems handling, even going downhill around bends.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tire!! Very smoth for long rides, excellent grip and you can ride with lower pressures.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Run awesome. Great balance of flat resistant tire and rolling ...
customer_reviews.text: Run awesome. Great balance of flat resistant tire and rolling resistance. Perfect for New England pot holes and junk in the road.
customer_reviews.author: R. Moore III

customer_reviews.title: Not as "puncture resistant" as you would think.
customer_reviews.text: Really was excited about getting these tires at a reasonable price and the exact color I wanted. They fit like a glove and rode great. That was until 30 minutes ago when somehow, the stem of an acorn was enough to puncture these "puncture resistant" tires and leave me 30 minutes away from my apartment. Really disappointed because up until this point I was extremely pleased with their riding performance for the first month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy these !!
customer_reviews.text: The tires are fast. No flat issues and the rubber seems to handle a bit of gravel with no problems. I'll definitely buy these again. I love the yellow. Stands out in our team rides. Avid cyclist
customer_reviews.author: Dan Karczewski

customer_reviews.title: Big Split
customer_reviews.text: I also got a flat just three rides in on this tire. Big split!!! I thought graphene was 200 times stronger than the strongest steel....according to Wikipedia. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Steve Knepper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it very nice tire, looks great on my bike, I'll recommend
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Good looking tires
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried these on the road yet. I hope they ride as good as they look. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gray

customer_reviews.title: Overall, Vittoria tires have been very disappointing. With ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, Vittoria tires have been very disappointing. With the Rubino, I have a side starting to split after just a few hundred miles. However, I have seen similar issues with my other Vittoria tires.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R. Solis

product_meta.title: Vittoria Rubino Pro G+ Road Tire
product_meta.description: The Vittoria Rubino Pro is probably one of the most popular tires off all time. Few other tires come even close to matching the Rubion Pro in weight, durability, all-around performance and grip. But Vittoria is never one to rest on their laurels, which is why when they came up with the G+ IsoTech concept for the Corsa tire, it was only a natural extension to flow that technology down to the Rubino. The result is that one of the best all-around tires has now become even better. The all-new Vittoria Rubino Pro G+ road tire brings the same handling and durability you (and everyone else) loved about the original, but now has a graphene carbon compound mixed into the rubber layup for increased mileage, puncture resistance and durability. That all sounds great, but the G+ compound goes even one step further and improves the cornering grip and rolling resistance as well. Combine that with a 3C three-compound rubber layup which helps give the different areas of the tire different handling properties, and a thicker tread with a high TPI casing, and you now have one of the best all-around performing tires ever. So whether you're a "super-commuter", putting in some big miles, or even racing, the Vittoria Rubino Pro G+ is a tire that lets you do it allG+ compound adds graphene to the tire rubber for better wear life and puncture resistance, as well as less rolling resistance and superior corning grip 3C four-compound layup gives you three different rubber compounds for different handling properties Thicker tread and supple casing improve puncture resistance and ride feel Easy and convenient clincher tire
feature_bullets: G+ compound adds graphene to the tire rubber for better wear life and puncture resistance
3C four-compound layup gives you three different rubber compounds for different handling properties
Thicker tread and supple casing improve puncture resistance and ride feel
Puncture protection at tread center and side wall
